explanations.machine learning: The paper proposes a prediction model using machine learning techniques, specifically the EEMD-LSTM model, to analyze railway transportation investment benefits.
explanations.deep learning: The study employs deep learning through the LSTM model to predict financial time series data.
explanations.neural network: The LSTM model is a type of neural network used in the study for time series prediction.
explanations.long short-term memory: The paper specifically mentions the use of LSTM (Long Short-Term Memory) networks for predicting investment prices.
explanations.LSTM: The LSTM model is central to the proposed prediction framework in the paper.
explanations.representation learning: The EEMD algorithm decomposes data into IMFs, which can be seen as a form of representation learning for time series data.
